description:
Genpachi is a captain of the imperial military police. One day he went on an assignment, accompanied by his soon-to-be brother-in-law http://anidb.net/ch50984 [Kobungo] into the north three years priors just to returned as a demon, who is hungry for spirits. He was supposed to marry Kobungo`s sister Nui, but upon their arrival, they had to find she has committed suicide. It was said that she carried the child of another man, whom she couldn`t identify, and due to having been received the news of her fianc√©es soon return, she couldn`t take it anymore.
Genpachi is often seen sparkling when looking at people who fit his type. He prays on Shino and hopes he will grow up soon.
He is the holder of the Faith bead.
name: Inukai Genpachi
